mapper.insert: insert into wishList (wishlistId, memberId, gCode) values (SUJUNG.WISHLISTID_SEQ.nextval, #{memberId}, #{gCode})
mapper.select: select * from wishList where memberid=#{memberId} and gCode=#{gCode}
mapper.delete: delete from wishList where memberid=#{memberId} and WISHLISTID=#{wishListId}
mapper.select: SELECT W.WISHLISTID as wishListId, W.GCODE as gcode, G.GNAME as gname, G.GIMAGE as gimage, G.GPRICE as gprice FROM WISHLIST W INNER JOIN GOODS G ON W.GCODE = G.GCODE WHERE W.MEMBERID = #{memberId}
